hero.title: Production-Ready Digital & AI Systems for Enterprises
hero.subtitle: We modernize sales, customer, and operations workflows with measurable, observable, and reliable systems.

why.title: Why Omnipreneur?
why.headline: Demos and production are not the same thing.

useCase.title: B2B Portal + AI Insights for Wholesale Companies
useCase.step2Desc: Why didn't close, collection risk, complaint themes

observability.title: Monitoring & Observability: The truth about your system
observability.description: Complete system visibility with metrics, logs, tracing, business KPIs, SLOs, alerts, and incident management processes.

ref1.title: Federation Management System and Admin Panel
ref1.description: Membership management, process automation, and reporting

ref2.title: Enterprise B2B Portal & Insights Platform
ref2.description: Customer portal, AI-powered analytics, and dashboard

digital.title: Enterprise Digital Systems
digital.overview: We develop enterprise websites, customer/distributor portals, and admin panels. We offer role-based access control, reporting, and integration-focused solutions.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis & Automation
ai.overview: We extract customer insights from WhatsApp and email data. We provide sales and collection analysis, complaint categorization, and workflow automation.
ai.outcome1: Automatic insights from customer communication data

rag.title: RAG & Knowledge Systems
rag.overview: We make your enterprise knowledge bases accessible with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems. We provide quality retrieval, access control, and freshness management.

observability.title: Observability & Operations
observability.overview: We monitor your systems in production. We set up metric, log, and tracing infrastructure. We create SLO design, alarm management, and incident response processes.

wholesale.title: Wholesale: B2B Portal + Collection & Sales Insights
wholesale.problemText: Wholesale companies struggle with customer follow-up. Collection risks are not detected early. WhatsApp and email communication cannot be managed.
wholesale.approachText: B2B portal for order management, AI-powered communication analysis, and collection risk scoring.
wholesale.measuredText: Collection delay times, sales conversion rates, customer complaint themes, communication response times.
wholesale.improvesText: Collection prediction accuracy, customer satisfaction, operational efficiency, sales team productivity.

federation.title: Organization/Federation: Membership + Process + Admin Panel
federation.problemText: Membership management is manual and error-prone. Process tracking is difficult. Reporting is delayed.
federation.approachText: Centralized membership management system, process automation, and comprehensive admin panel.
federation.measuredText: Membership processing times, process completion rates, reporting accuracy.
federation.improvesText: Operational speed, data accuracy, management visibility.

operations.title: Operations: Observability Setup + Alarm/SLO
operations.problemText: Systems are not monitored. Problems are detected late. SLOs are not defined.
operations.approachText: Metrics, logs, and tracing infrastructure, SLO design, alarm rules, and incident management processes.
operations.measuredText: System health metrics, error rates, response times, SLO compliance.
operations.improvesText: Incident detection time, system reliability, operational awareness.

catalog.title: Catalog: AI-Powered Catalog and Content Standardization
catalog.problemText: Product catalogs are inconsistent. No content standardization. Search and filtering are inadequate.
catalog.approachText: AI-powered content standardization, advanced search, and categorization.
catalog.measuredText: Content consistency, search success rates, user interaction metrics.
catalog.improvesText: User experience, content quality, operational efficiency.

reliability.title: Reliability First
reliability.description: Systems that work in production, scalable and resilient.

measurable.title: Measurable Outcomes
measurable.description: We define metrics, KPIs, and success criteria for every feature.

security.title: Security by Default
security.description: GDPR-compliant, access control, and security best practices.

integration.title: Integration Ready
integration.description: Compatible with your existing systems, API-first approach.

observability.title: Observability Stack
observability.description: Metrics, logs, and tracing infrastructure. Vendor-locked free, open standards.

federation.title: Federation Web + Admin Panel
federation.contextText: A federation needed a centralized system for membership management, process tracking, and reporting.
federation.builtText: Membership portal, comprehensive admin panel, role-based access control, and dashboards.
federation.measuredText: Membership processing times decreased by 60%. Reporting accuracy increased to 95%.
federation.operationsText: Daily system health checks, weekly performance reports, automatic backups.

b2b.title: B2B Wholesale Scenario
b2b.contextText: A wholesale company struggled with customer follow-up, collection risk, and communication management.
b2b.builtText: B2B portal, AI-powered communication analysis, collection risk scoring, and management dashboard.
b2b.measuredText: Collection delay prediction accuracy increased to 85%. Customer complaint response time decreased by 40%.
b2b.operationsText: Daily risk scores, weekly sales insights reports, automatic alarms.

footer.statement: Digital and AI-powered enterprise business systems. Production-ready, measurable, and observable solutions.
